duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieving fluency in client base and identifying, pursuing, and attaining new business from new and existing clients.

Handling responses to RFPs, pitch, presentation, and other opportunities via the development of written proposal and presentation materials for assigned department(s), practice(s), client team(s), and industry group(s).
Collaborating with outside organizations to advance the profile raising efforts of the firm's offices and practices.
Developing, implementing, and managing the firm's business development and client services plans consistent with firm strategies, goals, policies, and procedures.
Tracking participation and progress and encourages tailored business development approaches for each attorney.

Using metrics to demonstrate the firm's comparative advantages with regard to cycle times, cost per matter, actual costs vs. budgeted, favorable outcomes, and value, and educating the firm's attorneys in this regard.
Assisting with practice-specific business training needs.
Tracking and measuring outcomes on projects and ongoing activities based on the plans and budgets.
Ensuring marketing collateral is representative of the practice.
Executing monthly report tracking and analysis.
Leading or assisting other marketing and business development projects as needed.
Other duties as assigned to meet the requirements of the position.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field (MBA preferred)
